index.based_on_our_analysis_this_item_is: Based on our analysis, this item is not recyclable through conventional channels. Please dispose of it according to your local waste management guidelines.
index.this_item_appears_to_be_recyclable: This item appears to be recyclable! Would you like to list it in the marketplace or send it to a municipal recycling program?
